title: Denzel Curry Announces 2025 Tour
description: The Mischievous South World Tour brings the rapper across North America, Australia, and Europe
author: Nina Corcoran
excerpt: The Mischievous South World Tour brings the rapper across North America, Australia, and Europe
text: 02-21 Brisbane, Australia - The Tivoli02-22 Sydney, Australia - The Hordern Pavilion02-27 Auckland, New Zealand - Shed 1003-01 Wollongong, Australia - Yours & Owls Fest03-02 Melbourne, Australia - Palace Foreshore03-04 Perth, Australia - Metro City03-31 Phoenix, AZ - The Van Buren04-01 Albuquerque, NM - El Rey Theater04-03 Houston, TX - Bayou Music Center04-04 Austin, TX - Stubb’s Waller Creek Amphitheater04-05 Dallas, TX - The Factory in Deep Ellum04-08 Tampa, FL - Jannus Live04-10 Atlanta, GA - The Eastern04-11 Raleigh, NC - The Ritz04-12 Nashville, TN - The Pinnacle04-14 Washington, DC - The Fillmore Silver Springs04-16 New York, NY - Terminal 504-17 Boston, MA - Roadrunner04-18 Philadelphia, PA - Franklin Music Hall04-20 Toronto, Ontario - HISTORY04-21 Pittsburgh, PA - Stage AE04-22 Columbus, OH - KEMBA Live!04-24 Detroit, MI - Royal Oak Music Theatre04-25 Chicago, IL - The Salt Shed04-26 Minneapolis, MN - Fillmore Minneapolis04-28 Kansas City, MO - Uptown Theater04-30 Salt Lake City, UT - The Complex05-02 Seattle, WA - Showbox SoDo05-03 Vancouver, British Columbia - PNE Forum05-04 Portland, OR - McMenamins Crystal Ballroom05-06 Oakland, CA - Fox Theater05-09 Los Angeles, CA - Shrine Expo Hall06-03 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Melkweg Max06-05 Barcelona, Spain - Primavera Sound06-09 Prague, Czech Republic - Roxy06-10 Munich, Germany - Theaterfabrik06-11 Berlin, Germany - Huxleys06-18 London, England - O2 Academy Brixton06-20 Glasgow, England - O2 Academy Glasgow06-23 Dublin, Ireland - National Stadium07-01 Frankfurt, Germany - Zoom07-02 Cologne, Germany - Carlswerk Victoria07-03 Vienna, Austria - Gasometer07-07 Vilnius, Lithuania - Lukiskes Prison07-09 Hamburg, Germany - Grosse Freiheit
